content:
Perhaps I can sense the direction of the Lumia,
Perhaps I can discern the path of the celestial river,
info: 幻雪交付帐篷后到建成前的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
But when it comes to choosing an address for my home,
I find myself completely disoriented.
info: 幻雪交付帐篷后到建成前的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Rather than running around in circles myself,
I believe in leaving professional matters to professionals,
so I'll leave the site selection in your capable hands.
info: 幻雪交付帐篷后到建成前的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Once you've picked a spot,
I'll help set up the tent with you!
info: 幻雪交付帐篷后到建成前的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
